title: Simulation-Based Learning for Detecting Medication-Related Problems Using Electronic Health Records

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and experience interpreting clinical data
context.additional_context: Professionals requiring medical language analysis and EHR data interpretation

learning_goals: Identify medication-related problems (MRPs) with over 80% accuracy in a simulated EHR environment
Assess core clinical clues in information-overload situations using a three-step process (filtering-analysis-verification)
Determine drug interaction risk factors with 90% confidence in ambiguous patient record scenarios
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
